featured.text: Motion sickness occurs when the signals your brain receives from your eyes, ears, and body 17 .

definition.zh_def: 耳朵，聽覺器官，通常位於頭部兩側。
definition.en_def: The organ of hearing and balance in humans and other vertebrates, typically located on either side of the head.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful earring in her left ear.
